text: The Copa Constitució is the cup competition in Andorran football. It started in 1991. The winner of the Copa is playing in the qualification for UEFA Europa League. ==Mode== The cup is played in five rounds. In the first round the eight best teams of the Segona Divisió play four matches. The winner must play against the under half of the table of the Primera Divisió . In the third round the best teams of the Primera Divisió start in the competition. Then a half- and a final is played. ==Finals== Year Winner Team 2 Result 1991 Inter Club d'Escaldes ? 1994 CE Principat ? 1995 CE Principat ? 1996 CE Principat FC Santa Coloma 2:0 1997 CE Principat UE Sant Julià 7:0 1998 CE Principat FC Santa Coloma 4:3 1999 CE Principat FC Santa Coloma 3:1 2000 Constel·lació Esportiva FC Encamp 6:0 2001 FC Santa Coloma UE Sant Julià 2:0 2002 FC Lusitanos Inter Club d'Escaldes 2:0 2003 FC Santa Coloma UE Sant Julià 5:3 2004 FC Santa Coloma UE Sant Julià 1:0 2005 FC Santa Coloma UE Sant Julià 2:1 2006 FC Santa Coloma FC Rànger’s 1:1 a.e.t.
